seo.description: AI contract review software that extracts key terms, identifies critical clauses, and builds structured summaries. Dodonai's Extract & Draft Agents automate contract extraction from uploaded agreements.

hero.headline: AI Contract Review: Extract Key Terms and Clauses Automatically
hero.subheadline: Reviewing contracts for key terms, obligations, and risk clauses takes hours per agreement. Dodonai's Extract & Draft Agents read your contracts, pull the data points you specify, and hand back structured summaries in minutes.

sections.heading: How AI Contract Review Works for Legal Teams
paragraphs: Eighty vendor contracts for due diligence, key terms due Friday. Manually, that's a week of associate time. With AI contract review software, it's an afternoon.

Dodonai's {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agents}} automate contract extraction and the structuring phase of contract review. You define what data points matter (termination clauses, indemnification provisions, payment terms, renewal dates, governing law) and the AI reads each contract to extract those specific elements. The output is a structured summary that organizes the extracted terms consistently across all agreements, with every data point tracing to the exact source page.

This doesn't replace attorney judgment on contract risk or negotiation strategy. It eliminates the hours of manual reading required to gather the information attorneys need to make those judgments. When your team can review key terms from 50 contracts in the time it used to take to read 5, due diligence timelines shrink and contract management becomes proactive instead of reactive.

sections.heading: AI Contract Review and Extraction Tools

cards.title: Custom Extraction Agents
cards.description: Define the fields you need (termination rights, payment terms, indemnification caps, renewal dates, governing law) and a reusable {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agent}} pulls those data points from every contract you upload. Consistent structured output, every time.

cards.title: Clause Identification and Categorization
cards.description: Find every non-compete, limitation of liability, or change-of-control provision across 50 vendor agreements in seconds, without reading each one cover to cover. Clauses are categorized by type and linked to their source contract.

cards.title: Structured Contract Summaries
cards.description: Each summary covers contract parties, effective dates, key obligations, financial terms, and risk provisions, with page references for quick verification against the original agreement.

cards.title: Scanned Contract Processing
cards.description: Older agreements and records from opposing parties often arrive as scanned PDFs or faxed copies. Dodonai's {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI OCR}} converts these into fully readable text before extraction, so nothing in your review set gets skipped.

cards.title: Bulk Contract Review at Scale
cards.description: During due diligence or portfolio reviews, process dozens or hundreds of contracts through the same extraction template. The result: a structured comparison of key terms across all agreements, delivered in minutes instead of weeks.

items.title: Upload Your Contracts
items.description: Upload contracts as PDFs or Word documents. The platform handles multi-page agreements, scanned copies, and mixed-format files. No preprocessing required.

items.title: Configure Your Extraction Agent
items.description: Define the data points you want extracted: party names, effective dates, termination provisions, payment terms, indemnification clauses, or any other contract elements. Save the agent for reuse and run the same template across future due diligence sets without reconfiguring.

items.title: Review Extracted Terms and Export
items.description: Review the structured results with each entry linked back to the original page in the contract. Verify key provisions, then export as PDF, Word, or Excel.

faq.question: What types of contracts can Dodonai review and extract from?
faq.answer: Vendor agreements, employment contracts, leases, settlements, NDAs, service agreements, licensing deals, insurance policies, and more. The {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agents}} are configurable for any document structure, so you define what fields to extract based on the contract type.

faq.question: How accurate is AI contract extraction?
faq.answer: Accuracy is high for well-defined data points like dates, party names, dollar amounts, and specific clause types. Every extracted term includes a page citation linking to the original contract language, so attorneys can verify any data point in seconds. We recommend a review pass, just as you would with work from any associate or vendor.

faq.question: Can I build different extraction templates for different contract types?
faq.answer: Yes. Build separate agents for lease review, vendor audits, employment agreement analysis, or any other contract type. Each agent saves its template for reuse without reconfiguring.

faq.question: How does Dodonai handle scanned or image-only contract PDFs?
faq.answer: Dodonai's {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI-powered OCR}} converts scanned contracts, faxed copies, and image-only PDFs into extractable text. Older agreements and poorly scanned documents get included in your review without manual retyping.

faq.question: What does contract review with Dodonai cost?
faq.answer: Plans are based on page volume. Lite is $30/month for 200 pages, Basic is $60/month for 1,000 pages, Pro is $100/month for 5,000 pages. A 20-page contract uses 20 credits. Enterprise plans are available for large-scale due diligence. Visit our {{link:/pricing/|pricing page}} for details.

faq.question: Is my contract data secure?
faq.answer: Your contracts stay encrypted from upload to deletion. SOC 2 certified with AES-256 encryption and HIPAA compliance. We never train on your files, and you set the retention schedule.
